bike.description: Specialized FACT 7r carbon, triple monocoque construction, Designs for Women performance road geometry, Zertz seatstay inserts

components.description: Specialized FACT monocoque carbon fork legs, crown and steerer with Zertz
Specialized Mindset Plus, 1 1/8" integrated threadless, sealed stainless steel cartridge bearings, alloy 20mm cone with two 5mm alloy spacers
Specialized Pro-Set lightweight stem, 3D forged alloy, 4-bolt 31.8mm bar clamp, 4-position adjustable
Specialized Zertz Womens Pro Handlebar, short-reach drop, 31.8 Clamp
Body Geometry Bar Phat, cork ribbon with 2.5mm gel padding
Shimano 105, 10-speed, STI, flight deck compatible, with brake lever extensions
FSA integrated, alloy exterior cartridge bearings
Specialized All Condition Pro, 700 x 23c, aramid bead, 120TPI
Specialized All Condition Pro, 700 x 23c, aramid bead, 120TPI
Body Geometry Dolce Women's saddle, leather cover, Cr-Mo rails
Specialized Pav√©, FACT carbon seatpost with Zertz insert, 27.2mm
Chain stay protector, reflectors, chain catcher, clear coat, owners manual
